writing_guidelines.description: Integrating Walmart Style Guide requirements into processes.
Suppliers are responsible for costs associated with the CCP Program.
Items managed by a CCP can be updated through Item 360.
Item 360 is for manual item updates while CCP partners use a backend API.

summary: The FAQ page provides details about the benefits and responsibilities of participating in the CCP Program, alongside information on updating content for items managed by CCP, and clarifies the differences between Item 360 and CCP.
